newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch shares end almost 3 pct higher, record close.
newsitem.headline: Dutch shares end almost 3 pct higher, record close.

text.p: 1540 GMT - Dutch shares close at a new record, with the index finding continued support in higher Wall Street, stronger dollar and a firmer bond market. Dealers say some investors might cash in their profits, but market not seen dipping in coming days. Semiconductor equipment maker ASM Lithography strong after announcing a rise in first half profits. Philips strong ahead of tomorrow's Q2 results. * AEX share index close 27.86 points higher at 988.48, after
jumping to an all time high of 10006.26 at the open. * ASML ends 16.40 guilders higher at 178.20. * Philips closes 9.40 guilders higher at 162.10.
